channel.title: Create an S3 Interface endpoint :: AWS Intership Report
channel.description: In this section you will create and test an S3 interface endpoint using the simulated on-premises environment deployed as part of this workshop. Return to the Amazon VPC menu. In the navigation pane, choose Endpoints, then click Create Endpoint. In Create endpoint console: Name the interface endpoint In Service category, choose aws services In the Search box, type S3 and press Enter. Select the endpoint named com.amazonaws.us-east-1.s3. Ensure that the Type column indicates Interface.
